Medium: Gelatin silver print, by Peter Moore
CreditLine: The Gilbert and Lila Silverman Fluxus Collection Archive, The Museum of Modern Art Archive
Title: In Memoriam to Adriano Olivetti, performed by Ay-O, Alison Knowles, George Maciunas, Ben Vautier, Robert Watts, and unidentified individuals during Fully Guaranteed 12 Fluxus Concerts, Flux Hall, 359 Canal Street, New York, April 18, 1964
